name: newsblur
description: NewsBlur is a feature-rich, self-hosted RSS reader with social features, saved stories, and training filters. It supports folders, tags, web and mobile clients, and optional hosted services.
features: RSS feed reader: Subscribe to and organize feeds from blogs, news sites, and podcasts.
Intelligence training: Train filters to highlight or hide stories based on keywords, authors, or tags.
Social features: Share stories, follow other users, and discover new feeds through community.
Saved stories: Archive articles for later reading with tags and search functionality.
Mobile apps: Native iOS and Android clients sync reading progress across devices.
Folder organization: Group feeds into folders and subfolders for structured content management.
Unread management: Mark stories as read automatically or manually with flexible reading modes.
Full-text search: Find articles across all feeds by searching content, titles, or metadata.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage feeds efficiently with customizable hotkeys.
Original view: Read articles in their original layout or in a clean text-only mode.
Import/export: Migrate feeds from other readers using OPML format for easy transitions.
Statistics dashboard: View reading habits, feed activity, and subscription analytics over time.
